title: What is Decorator pattern?
content: In object-oriented programming, the decorator pattern is a design pattern that allows the behaviour to be added to an individual object, either statically or dynamically, without affecting the behaviour of other objects from the same class. title: What is Observer pattern ?
What is Strategy pattern?
content: In computer programming, the strategy pattern (also known as the policy pattern) is a behavioural software design pattern that enables selecting an algorithm at runtime. Instead of implementing a single algorithm directly, code receives run-time instructions as to which is a family of algorithms
